column4: I have a whooole bunch of epub files I'd like to extract ... does anybody know how I would, say, extract numerous separate epub files in a dir?
Have you tried using 7-Zip or WinRAR on one of the packs to see if it's supported ?
winrar?  Really? the default archive package manager seems to do fine I just want to do it all en masse
Well, any decompressor. Just used these two as likely ones supporting it.
